DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether small for gestational preterm infants, have delayed or decrease gastric motility compared to appropriate for gestational age preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Electrogastrography in Small for Gestational Age Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: 1. preterm infants 3237 weeks' gestation 2. No sepsis or ventilation 3. Feeding orally or with NG tube. 4. Age <48 h to be included 1. GE reflux 2. Medication that affect gastric motility
